item.description: Feeling Hot! Hot! Hot! Come on down and dance the night away with a great bunch of people from all over. These parties were great last year with over 200 in attendance. Limbo Contest, Twist Contest and who knows what else. Great outdoor patio area to relax, mix and mingle. They'll be free Hot Dogs too!! (Wow can they spare it, LOL) You can find out more at www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com and you can also register for a chance to get in free there also. Doors open at 8pm and the cover is $7 till 8:30 for the early birds, then it goes up to $10. People from all over and a bunch of other groups show up to have a great time.
item.name: Dance Under the Stars!!
